pages.title: Spruce Planks!
pages.text: Gathering $(#FFA500)Spruce Planks $()is simple! This is the 3rd capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Item Given: Spruce Planks

pages.name: Capability Level 200
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 200$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Spruce Planks$()
